c74object.name: bach.write
c74object.description: Writes an llll to a file.

method.name: llll
method.digest: Store the llll to be written
method.description: In second inlet: the llll is stored, to be written upon reception of a write or writetxt message.

method.name: write
method.digest: Write the llll in native format
method.description: In first inlet: the stored llll is written to the specified file in native format. Native format is not easily editable outside Max but it yields exact storage of floating-point numbers. If no file name is provided, a dialog box will open.

method.name: writetxt
method.digest: Write the llll in text format
method.description: In first inlet: the stored llll is written to the specified file in text format. Text format is easily editable in any text editor, but representation of floating-point numbers is approximate. If no file name is provided, a dialog box will open.

c74object.discussion: The llll can be written in text or native format. Text format is easily editable through any text editor, native format yields exact storage of floats.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The llll can be written in text or native format. Text format is easily editable through any text editor, native format yields exact storage of floats.

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: write, save, disk, file, native, text.
